questionnaire.title: irAKI vs Other AKI Classification Assessment
questionnaire.reference: Sprangers et al. Nature Reviews Nephrology 2022

questions.question: The temporal relationship between immune checkpoint inhibitor (ICI) exposure and AKI onset strongly supports irAKI diagnosis
Prerenal causes of AKI have been adequately excluded
Postrenal/obstructive causes of AKI have been adequately excluded
Other intrinsic causes of AKI (ATN, contrast nephropathy, other drugs) have been adequately excluded
Urinalysis findings are consistent with immune-mediated kidney injury

interpretation.1-3: Evidence strongly against irAKI / Alternative diagnosis likely
interpretation.7-9: Evidence strongly supports irAKI / High probability diagnosis

confidence_thresholds.high_confidence: ≥7 on ≥12 questions with no major contradictions
confidence_thresholds.moderate_confidence: ≥6 on most questions with some uncertainty
